short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Link Shortner - eeb.me, zpit.us, cvrd.us, eaby.us

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shorten your Current Browser link and save it to your Ref.li Account. In this way you may bookmark the URLs you want to save and access it later, also this service is helpful to shorten the urls and links which you use to share with friends or blog users which are easy and remember-able.
Registering for an API Key is required:
As before, an API key is required for requests to be processed by the system. Once a user registers, an API key is automatically generated for this user. The API key must attached to request via the api parameter.
